I am offering this product to you at a special price of $20000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its value and the opportunity it presents. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further or make an offer based on your assessment of its worth. I look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000.
